title: Algorithm Plugin Input Arguments
description: A schema for algorithm plugin input arguments

sensitive_feature.title: Sensitive Feature Names
sensitive_feature.description: Array of Sensitive Feature Names (e.g. Gender)

file_name_label.title: Name of column containing image file names
file_name_label.description: Key in the name of the column containing the file names in the annotated ground truth dataset

threshold_config.title: Threshold Values
threshold_config.description: Threshold values of the predicted results

threshold_label.title: Threshold Label
threshold_label.description: The label that the Threshold Value should be classified under.

lower_label.title: Lower Label Value
lower_label.description: The LOWER label/ground truth value of the data. E.g. 0

higher_label.title: Higher Label Value
higher_label.description: The HIGHER label/ground truth value of the data. E.g. 1

threshold_value.title: Threshold Value
threshold_value.description: The label value which the threshold value should be classified under.
